net.coderazzi.filters.artifacts
Interface ITableModelFilter

All Known Implementing Classes:
TableModelFilter
public interface ITableModelFilter

The table used for filtering must set a TableModel implementing this interface.

Author:
Luis M Pena - lu@coderazzi.net

Method Summary
 TableModel getModel()
          Returns the underlying model.
 void setRowFilter(RowFilter filter)
          Sets the filter that determines which rows, if any, should be hidden from the view.
